If you are experiencing email problems related to accessing meetings or university email lists, contact the university administration or your teachers to request access. They should be able to assist you with any issues related to email access or specific email lists. It's important to provide them with as much information as possible regarding the issue you are facing so that they can provide you with the appropriate support
